title: Mcp-Jira-Server
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for integrating with Jira's REST API, enabling programmatic management of Jira issues.
creator: 1broseidon

JIRA_EMAIL.description: The email address associated with your Jira account.

JIRA_API_TOKEN.description: The API token generated from Atlassian Account Settings.

JIRA_DOMAIN.description: The base domain of your Jira instance (e.g., your-domain.atlassian.net).
